var cv_mo2EYK1KCULX6YGpreplay = document.getElementById('cv_mo2EYK1KCULX6YGpreplayImageId'); if (cv_mo2EYK1KCULX6YGpreplay) { cv_mo2EYK1KCULX6YGpreplay.onmouseover = function() { cv_mo2EYK1KCULX6YGpreplay.src = "http://ecx.images-amazon.com/images/I/71UyDQ7AtwS._SX320_PHcustomer-video-vignette_PIvideo-reviews-bottom,BottomLeft,0,43_OU01_PIcustomer-video-play-active,BottomLeft,130,-12_CR0,0,0,0_.png"; } cv_mo2EYK1KCULX6YGpreplay.onmouseout = function() { cv_mo2EYK1KCULX6YGpreplay.src = "http://ecx.images-amazon.com/images/I/71UyDQ7AtwS._SX320_PHcustomer-video-vignette_PIvideo-reviews-bottom,BottomLeft,0,43_OU01_PIcustomer-video-play,BottomLeft,130,-12_CR0,0,0,0_.png"; } var node = cv_mo2EYK1KCULX6YGpreplay.parentNode; var cv_mo2EYK1KCULX6YGcurrentClick = node.onclick; node.onclick = function () { var head = document.getElementsByTagName("head"); if (head[0]) { var logTag = document.createElement('script'); logTag.type = "text/javascript"; logTag.src = "/gp/customer-media/du/log.html?ie=UTF8&p=CustomerImage&s=CustomerVideoPlay"; head[0].appendChild(logTag); } if (cv_mo2EYK1KCULX6YGcurrentClick) { return cv_mo2EYK1KCULX6YGcurrentClick(); } } } Length:: 1:01 MinsThis Pyle Astro is the best generic Android tablet I've used yet. There are now five tablets floating around my house, so I have a lot to compare it to, including a Kindle Fire HD 8.9" tablet. Obviously, the specs will not compare for that, but compared to my other generic tablets, it comes out ahead.SURFING THE WEBThere's a little lag loading pages, but it's not too bad. The only real problem I had was YouTube (see below).STREAMING AUDIO AND VIDEOI loaded Songza onto this device. The app takes a little time to load, but the music streams with no problems. I found the sound loud and clean enough for personal listening. For a fuller sound, consider adding a Bluetooth speaker.YouTube took forever to load. The tablet fell asleep, so I gave up. YouTube videos embedded on other sites stream well.BLUETOOTH AND WI-FIBluetooth is very good. I paired it with my headphones and the range is excellent. I can listen to music a whole floor and some rooms away. Not all tablets come with Bluetooth. I'm happy this one does.Wi-Fi signal is a little weaker than what I can get with the dongle on my computer tower, but it works. It connects much faster than the Wi-Fi on my other Android tablet.CAMERAThe rear-facing camera is superior to the one on the Pyle Astro 9-inch tablet. There are no shadows cast on the lens from the case, and the image is clear.The front-facing camera does not appear to have as high a resolution as the rear-facing camera, but it works well enough for me. Action scenes are a little more pixellated. Close up shots are a little blurry. These are general purpose cameras. If you need the finest quality, you may be disappointed, but I like the cameras. They are better than the cameras on my other generic Android tablets.GENERAL OPERATIONTouch sensitivity and responsiveness is very good, but the screen is not as slick as other more expensive tablets. Also, there is a slot for a micro SD card, but I did not use it.My kids love this tablet because it plays Minecraft without glitches. One of the other tablets always stalls and shuts off, but this one works just fine. All the apps I loaded onto the Pyle Astro work just fine.FINAL THOUGHTSThe Pyle Astro is an inexpensive alternative to the higher end tablets. I would recommend it for children, as an introductory tablet for adults, and for light users.This product was provided for review by the Max Borges Agency._______________________UPDATE 1/5/14: I would like to add that I did not initially use a micro SD card, but I did try to mount one and it doesn't work. This hasn't affected my enjoyment of the tablet, because I really don't ever use a micro SD card. If you need to use one, this tablet may not be for you.
Reviews.Title: My Favorite Generic Android Tablet

Reviews.Author: Madelyn J  Bonham
Reviews.Content: I purchased this for my granddaughter for Christmas and it worked slow, but ok for 1 week. It froze on the Android loading logo, and would go no further. I notified Pyle tech support, who said to return it to the seller.  They were great. I returned it and they sent me a new replacement in 5 days. I opened the new one, charged it, turned it on, touched the unlock. Unreal! The touch screen did not respond. I reread the user's manual, restarted it, reset it and still, no response. I called Pyle tech support again and they told me to tape a note on it ( so none else received it as a replacement), and to return it  once again. They came through with flying colors on my 2nd return. This time I chose a full refund, and I am looking for a different tablet.  Not only were the Pyle tablets bad, their tech support and service were also.
Reviews.Title: Spend a few more dollars!

Reviews.Author: Mindy9877
Reviews.Content: I picked this tablet for my husband to use while he is on the road driving.  He was looking for certain things in a tablet and I was able to find what he was looking for.  I searched and looked at a lot of them here on Amazon.  Pyle fit the description he was looking for.  So far there hasn't been any kind of issues with using this tablet.  We were able to set things up really easily and add apps with no difficulty. The only thing it that it can take awhile to charge it but otherwise it is a perfect fit.  Thanks Pyle.
Reviews.Title: Please with tablet

Reviews.Author: Irene Peterson
Reviews.Content: I did not want to pay a fortune for a tablet. I found the Pyle 9" android and purchased it for a very reasonable price. Quality is very good and it has all the features I was looking for. Speed could be a little faster but very happy with it for the price. Just ordered a case for it.
Reviews.Title: Love this tablet

Reviews.Author: Quality Wireless Zone
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a general tablet under $100 with Bluetooth capability. I have to say I am very pleased with this tablet. I use it to stream music from my Bluetooth headphones and also with my Bluetooth speaker. Paired the tablet with no issues and there was no loss of quality. Web browsing on Wi-Fi no problem. Good tablet for the price.
Reviews.Title: Nice Tablet

Reviews.Author: AnalyzeThis29
Reviews.Content: Well I actually now received this due to shipping problems but not from amazon.com at home to be exact. Well so far just setting up my accounts and stuff, it works pretty well but the camera could do some upgrade & more battery life but its a cool buy until I can afford a too class Tablet.
Reviews.Title: Awesome buy for now.

Reviews.Author: Judy
Reviews.Content: Now I did not buy it for myself. It is a birthday gift for my grandaughters best friend. BUT I am sure that she will be very happy with this tablet. IN fact I plan on buying 2 more. 1 to keep and 1 to give as a gift..
Reviews.Title: It works great !

Reviews.Author: BERNARD LEDAN
Reviews.Content: GOOD PRODUCT, I'M LISTENING TO MP3S NOW DOWNLOAD APPS TO D.J AND THE SIZE IS COOL TO KEEP IN HAND OR BAG
Reviews.Title: IN THE MEDIUM

Reviews.Author: susan williamson
Reviews.Content: thank you still learning how to use it but i love it so munch. got it for on the go
Reviews.Title: mine

Reviews.Author: wiretap
Reviews.Content: I use this in my truck along with a OBD2 Bluetooth dongle and Torque App for data monitoring of engine parameters. It is a great tablet for the price. It isn't super fast by any means, but you can also browse Facebook and YouTube without much lag. I definitely recommend this tablet if you are on a tight budget.
Reviews.Title: Excellent tablet for the price

Reviews.Author: Antony Calvo
Reviews.Content: This an awesome device. For a small price, you get SO for your money. This is truly an awesome product. I am thinking of buying a few more.
Reviews.Title: Great device for the price

Reviews.Author: Carl Thomson
Reviews.Content: I actually purchased this tablet to replace a blue tooth MP3 player that I bought on Amazon. After just 4 month's it just died,I returned it to the manufacture and they sent me a new one. Six month's later the same thing. It cost $50.00. For Just $70.00 I got a blue tooth tablet that play's my MP3 music and I can log onto Pandora and stream music from there. Plus all the benefits of a tablet. A great buy.
Reviews.Title: Great tablet for the price.

Reviews.Author: Deborah Arnold
Reviews.Content: Best option for a starter for kids. Not expensive and able to do a lot for entertainment without the worry of your 7 year old will break it.
Reviews.Title: perfect starter for kids

Reviews.Author: Becky Flint-fike
Reviews.Content: I wish the apps wouldn't crash so much, but otherwise, it is a decent little tablet. Considering it was purchased to use as a mobile document reader and not one of the office apps work on it, I don't really like it that much. It's good for playing games on, though.
Reviews.Title: Not bad...

Reviews.Author: Home Theater Guy "http://www.home-theater-sys...
Reviews.Content: I would advise against buying this as Pyle offers no replacement screen and will not repair it. My son broke his screen and now it's basically a paperweight. They wouldn't even give me the name of the oriental manufacturer so I could order one and replace it myself. VERY poor customer service and I will never buy another Pyle item as items are not Pyle but rather bought in bulk from overseas where they are made as cheap as possible and Pyle just sticks their name on it.
Reviews.Title: No replacement screen available.. or repair by Pyle

Reviews.Author: Watalulu
Reviews.Content: I bought this tablet for my mom to use as an ereader. I had it sent to me initially so that I could download some of her favorite games on it first. Everything seemed fairly easy to use. My mom has since received the tablet, and aside from getting used to how it works, seems quite happy with it.
Reviews.Title: Family satisfaction.

Reviews.Author: zzmaus
Reviews.Content: Bluetooth will not stay on. Bluetooth turns itself off and will not allow you turn it back on. I use the same program and bluetooth device with my other tablet and it works fine. Would not waste your time.
Reviews.Title: Bluetooth will not stay connected.

Reviews.Author: cheryl register
Reviews.Content: NOT SATISFIED AT ALL WITH EITHER TABLETS I ORDEREDarrived in tack, after charging for more than 5 hrs will not turn on am returning for replacement.PLEASE CONTACT ME AT CHERYL.REGISTER@ROCKPORTCOASTAL.COM
Reviews.Title: NOT SATISFIED AT ALL

Reviews.Author: alicia cosner
Reviews.Content: I was worried about purchasing this but I am so glad I did. It is simple to use and understand and does everything I need it to do. I could not be happier
Reviews.Title: Pleasantly suprised. Im loving it

Reviews.Author: dlkhollywood
Reviews.Content: Recently bought the Pyle 9 inch Astro android tablet and was very disappointed with the performance.  When using the keypad I sometimes got a different letter or character then the one I pressed.  Also had problem with the tablet not responding to the touch of my finger or stylus. When I hooked it to my PC using a USB cable, my computer never recognized it's presence, (so I couldn't sync music to it) and I wasn't able to find a driver online that worked with the tablet. I don't know if it was with the tablet or my wireless router, but I was constantly loosing response/connection with the site and having to close the program.  If you're looking for a low cost tablet, I wish you better luck with the Pyle Asrto then I had.
Reviews.Title: Bye bye Astro!

Reviews.Author: Brianna Menicucci
Reviews.Content: I chose this product as a tablet to send my mother in law who lives out of state so we could use skype with her, and so she could stream movies or tv shows. That is all I was purchasing it for, and it couldnt complete either task. I have an Asus tablet that i absolutely love, and i will be getting a refurbished one to save some money and give to my mother in law after I return this product.7 reasons not to by this product... (I could think of more, but its not worth the energy.)1) It had a hard time staying on at all... it seemed to keep crashing2) Hard to get it to turn back on from sleep mode3) I went to try and stream a YouTube clip, and it couldnt even play, it just continually loaded4) I tried to log into the Android market, it just kept crashing5) When i tried to simply turn on the camera app... it froze... then crashed6) The graphics.... were grainy and straining on my eyes.7) Lastly... After Skype decided to work... it was only for about 5 seconds, it then froze, and crashed... Big surprise there.All in all, this was a complete waist of my energy. Thankfully, I had this tablet sent to me first and not directly to my mother in law. I tested it, figurered out it was the worst tablet I have ever dealt with, and returned it. I will be purchasing a brand name tablet that has been refurbished to save some money.
Reviews.Title: Not worth the price!!

Reviews.Author: TMorning "Lpn to RN"
Reviews.Content: I chose a two star rating due to receiving a unit that appeared used and was already turned on. The screen had a big crack as well.I have never had this problem when ordering electronics from Amazon.I am unable to comment about the reliability of this unit due to receiving a defective one.
Reviews.Title: Arrived with Craked screen

Reviews.Author: Ronald Knight
Reviews.Content: I received the unit and it broke within 7 days!!!! Don't buy this pay the extra few bucks and get a better tablet. i wanted to like it...bought it for my lil girl so she could download game apps. DISAPPOINTED!!!Ron
Reviews.Title: TERRIBLE

Reviews.Author: davonc309
Reviews.Content: DONT WASTE YOUR MONEY. I purchased this tablet like a week ago and it can't keep a charge. Even if its fully charged you have 3 hours and 59 minutes of use once you take it off charge. The tablet does come with Bluetooth but it won't keep it on. I tried to connect my Lg HBS730 and it wouldn't keep it logged on. The screen wouldn't stay on. Then I contacted Amazon for a refund and the was more than helpful , but then they told me that I had to contact the Pyle Astro company. I'm just gonna return the device and look else where.
Reviews.Title: This tablet is a piece of work

Reviews.Author: Peter Bernard
Reviews.Content: The first one I got seemed OK for the price at first, but after a couple of days it started freezing randomly and often. I returned it am awaiting the replacement now. I just want one that works. I know they're cheap tablets, but come on. They should at least function, even if not at rocket speeds.Others here who have made return exchanges have mostly seemed to get a replacement they were satisfied. If I get another dud, at least I know Amazon customer service will make it right.
Reviews.Title: OK but first was a dud

Reviews.Author: Larry A
Reviews.Content: this tablet is very slow I reset it and still facebook loads and crashes no instagram download at google store gameplay wont load then when it did very slow no 3D touch screen have to press more then once and I'm still looking for the Digital part of this tablet
Reviews.Title: very slow

Reviews.Author: Eric Benefield "Eric J. Benefield"
Reviews.Content: This tablet would not load pages and was very slow when it did, I do not recommend it at all.
Reviews.Title: Very slow

Reviews.Author: Detailed "HonestReview"
Reviews.Content: I was just holding it & my finger on the back caused the screen to produce a ripple effect--It was Very Annoying! I'm returning it. I liked the keyboard, except they have the delete button where the enter should be. The speakers were loud, but a bit tin'e. Also, couldn't find apps or install them from Google Play--apps that were made for Android 4.0 or lower.
Reviews.Title: Screen isn't insulated enough

Reviews.Author: Josip
Reviews.Content: We got this tablet for our 6-year-old. It looks good and all but that's where the positive things stop.Surfing the web is not smooth and it does take a while to load the browser. We installed a few math and abc apps for kids together with angry birds and some other games for kids. Being an IT professional and a "geek" I always have to compare it to my windows and android devices. This thing does not even come close to any device I own.On the other hand I am happy that it is not running as smooth as the google nexus 7 or similar. This will be a perfect first tablet for kids and parents who just want to use it as a kindle device.The processor is far to slow for movie editing or photo editing. Camera resolution is terrible and in low light you can't even see what you are taking photos of.I am giving it three stars because it is still a useable device for kids and very simple apps.
Reviews.Title: Good for kids but not even near higher priced tablets

Reviews.Author: George
Reviews.Content: Super slow and locks up. It will not even connect to my bluetooth headset. It was a waste of my time and money.
Reviews.Title: What a let down

Reviews.Author: TDubAZ
Reviews.Content: I ordered the pyle PTBL92BC model which is bluetooth capable, but what the seller sent me was the PTBL9C which is not. At first i did not realize the difference until after i was already disappointed in this tablets performance, but after going through the process of trying to return it i noticed there was no bluetooth connect button which led me to check the model#, and low and behold this was not the correct unit. I received this on Jan 3rd and its going back Jan 5th.Reasons for return: It was slow, lagged on my game apps. Screen resolution is 800x480, thought it wouldn't matter but it did.The speakers are really good for a tablet however, good for sitting a kid down with a movie or something.
Reviews.Title: If it's for kids this should be ok

Reviews.Author: wayne denton
Reviews.Content: Only two of the three i ordered are still currently working.the speaker sound is really good and they work fairly well but one of the tablets i ordered when my mother unlawful went to turn it on the power button stuck in and now wont do anything and since then my girl has been going through the mill trying to get it replace from the company Amazon even suggested to them to resolve this issue. They're product breaks then to send it back you have to pay for a restocking fee, no i don't think so the item is broken and didn't even have two days of use the only reason why i gave it any stars is because i was Impressed with the speaker sound.
Reviews.Title: pyle has good speakers

Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I'm using it to post this review. I liked my Android cell phone, so I knew I' d like this tablet. It has 4G video viewing capability. I keep it charged when not in use, so it's ready for use a lot. The price is great for our space age technology, which becomes obsolete quickly. I plan to upgrade mine once per year. I use it with a plastic & rubber stand by GMYLE & am waiting for my 4-pack of stylus for keying in text on it to arrive. It can be used at any WiFi hotspot, like for free at public libraries.
Reviews.Title: Great Value For The Reduced Price

Reviews.Author: gene
Reviews.Content: Got this tablet today and it worked great right out of the box. After reading other reviews I immediately tried all the functions and all worked as advertised. The one comment about youtube videos is correct, they do load slowly. No problem loading the SD card. All in all, a nice tablet for the price. My only problem is my wife won't give it back!
Reviews.Title: Pyle Astro PTBL92BC

Reviews.Author: Chris
Reviews.Content: This tablet is slow as dirt.  It takes forever to load just about anything.  Youtube app also will not work, though youtube.com through a browser works ok, just still very slow! My old myTouch cell phone is faster and in all ways better than this with the exception of screen size, but I get so tired of waiting for anything to load that the screen size doesn't really do anything for me at this point!
Reviews.Title: Slow as dirt

Reviews.Author: paulo rafael sanchez v
Reviews.Content: i like this tablet, so far my customers are happy with this product, i wold like to say that its a good product and so far its been working ok, i wish i could say the same of the subwoofer pyle but this tablet its good, i like it!
Reviews.Title: good tablet

Reviews.Author: Faye Fellig
Reviews.Content: Great tablet with a great price, would recommend it and you wont be sorry, it works as good as the more expensive brands.
Reviews.Title: Love my Tablet

Reviews.Author: Asad J.
Reviews.Content: I dont write reviews normally. I dont return stuff either. This tablet is making me do both.I took a chance despite the mediocre reviews and decided to go ahead and buy the tablet, understanding that there'd be shortcomings, since its as economical as it is. But this tablet can't even do the basics.Twice it froze even turning on. It couldn't open facebook, or youtube by the apps. It's just too low in terms of specs, just cant handle even basic app work. So verdict: look elsewhere, buy something else. Chip in a few extra bucks and get something slightly more capable of conducting tasks you'd hope a tablet would be able to do. Cuz ultimately, something having kick-ass battery life still sucks if you can't do anything with it while its on. It's day 3 with the tablet here, and its boxed and ready for returns.
Reviews.Title: Cheap tablets are cheapppppp!

Reviews.Author: RBae
Reviews.Content: Unable to CHARGE TabletWe try with AC adapter supplied and it does not work.Also try connecting via Usb To my computer and  also  does not chargeWhat can I doThere is no way to contact supplier on amazon pageRBaez
Reviews.Title: DAMAGED PRODUCT

Reviews.Author: Scott A. Miller
Reviews.Content: I wasn't expecting much from a $60 tablet - I just wanted something to test a simple Bluetooth app with.  It wasn't even able to do that.  Wi-fi didn't work at all, and Bluetooth would try for a few seconds to turn on and then would stay stuck in the 'off' position.  I could have lived with the glithcy, laggy touch screen, but without connectivity it's useless to me.
Reviews.Title: Wifi and bluetooth inoperable out of the box

ProductInfo.Features:
Google Android 4.0 Operating System
1.2GHz Cortex A13 Processor Chip with 3D Graphic Acceleration
File Compatibility: MP3, MP4, WMA, WAV, AVI, WMV, MOV, JPG, JPEG and much more
High-Speed Wireless Network: 802.11 b/g/n Built-in Bluetooth Technology for Wireless Data Streaming
Includes AC Adaptor, USB Cable and OTG (Micro USB Adaptor) Cable
ProductInfo.Name: Pyle Astro PTBL92BC Android 9-Inch Bluetooth Digital Touch-Screen 3D Graphics Wi-Fi Tablet
